parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Diagnostic

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Registers new log file recording a network traffic and returns handle of the log. The log file is saved inside the Arma 3 root folder.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>[[logNetwork]] can potentially create a large log file.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[logNetwork]] logFile

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> logFile: [[String]] - Where to store the log

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> filter: [[Array]] of [[String|strings]] - ????

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - handle for the logging

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_handle = [[logNetwork]] ["myLog.txt",[""]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[logNetworkTerminate]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
